comments.body: nit: errors must start with lower case here and elsewhere. If this is not strictly enforced across the codebase you can ignore this comment.

I'm following a pattern in dockertools which uses errors this way and defines them with starting caps. Currently running e2e, let me know if you'd like me to change it otherwise I plan to leave it as is.
Leave it as is. We can clean up the code later in one sweep.
